extendedIngredients.name: broccoli rabe
extendedIngredients.original: 1 bunch (1 1/4 lbs) broccoli rabe, trimmed and cut crosswise into 3-inch pieces
extendedIngredients.originalName: bunch broccoli rabe, trimmed and cut crosswise into 3-inch pieces

extendedIngredients.name: garlic cloves
extendedIngredients.original: 3 medium garlic cloves, crushed and peeled

extendedIngredients.name: lemon zest
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tsps julienned lemon zest, plus fresh lemon juice for serving
extendedIngredients.originalName: julienned lemon zest, plus fresh lemon juice for serving

extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.original: 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling
extendedIngredients.originalName: extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling

title: Braised Broccoli Rabe
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Braised Broccoli Rabe a try. Watching your figure? This caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 recipe has 155 calories, 5g of protein, and 14g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4 and costs $1.24 per serving. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. If you have lemon zest, pepper, garlic cloves, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 90%. This score is excellent. Try Braised Broccoli Rabe, Braised Broccoli Rabe, and Braised Broccoli Rabe With Orecchiette for similar recipes.
